answers.answer: Oh wow he's really healthy! I found out yesterday that my baby girl weighs 4lbs 4oz, and im 32 weeks. Is this your first baby?
Wiyh my second son he was 9lbs and i did it all natural  and i was 39.6 weeks

Thats awesome are you due 2/1?? If so we have the same due date lol that is big! I had an ultrasound today and my little man is weighing 6 pounds 8 oz im 36+3 as well thats big to me considering my daughter was born just shy of 39 weeks and she weighed only 6 pounds 10 oz lol
At 37 weeks my little boy weighed 10lb, my due date is tomorrow and I'm having a sweep, if that doesn't work then I'm being induced next Thursday at 41 weeks xx

Im 32 week .but at 31 weeks i found out my lil man is almost five pounds and he growing three weeks ahead .my doc told i would have him around 37 to 38 weeks .my due date was march 3 but i guess i wud have him around February10
Also 81% grown Already almost fully developed
Thanks for all of the responses you guys! This is my first baby! I am due 2/1! I'm seeing my doctor this Friday so hopefully she will give me more of an idea on what she plans to do.
I gave birth to an 8lbs baby 3wks ago
My daughter was born in May and weighed 9 pounds 5 ounces at birth.. I had her naturally with no complications.

You are definitely not alone. I had a routine checkup Monday and they told me that my fundal height is at 40 weeks. They moved my due date ahead 6 days which puts it at February 4th and makes me 36 weeks today. I would have been 35 weeks yesterday. I just got diagnosed with Gestational Diabetes and my baby is nearly 10 lbs already. I am having a C-Section January 21st. I completely understand your worry. If it helps any at 30 weeks he was weighing almost 6 lbs. So he gained 5 lbs in a month. I blame my doctor because I passed my hour test and they made me take a 3 hour test at 33 weeks and I failed. Try not to stress.
My first born was 10.1lbs at birth and I went naturally two days before the expected due date
Just curious, what is it that you blame your doctor for?
All of my aunties babies weighed over 12 pounds and she did home births for all three. I don't know how she did it lol but it's definitely possible. And all her kids were born after the due date.

I blame my doctor for the fact that they saw my numbers were borderline for my glucose test that I took at 24 weeks. I feel that they should have caught that and had me take the 3 hour test then. If it would have been caught soon enough then I would have had the proper medication to control the issue and my baby wouldn't be nearly 10 lbs at 36 weeks. So I basically have gone maybe 2 and a half to 3 months without proper care. It's not like I knew I had Gestational Diabetes.

question: Hey guys! Just found out that my baby boy is in the 90th percentile and already weighs 8 lbs. I am 36+3 weeks but I'm wondering if any other moms out there had bigger babies and got induced early or had csections before their due date? I am scared to deliver a 10 pound baby!
title: big baby!
